adjectives.description: readable (comparative more readable, superlative most readable)

entries.meaning: (of handwriting, print, etc) legible, possible to read or at least decipher
examples: If that sign was still readable we'd know where we are!

entries.meaning: which can be read—i.e. accessed or played—by a certain technical type of device
examples: No sale, those aren't readable with my DVD-player!

entries.meaning: (of a book) enjoyable to read, of an acceptable stylistic quality or at least functionally composed
examples: These assembly instructions aren't readable, I still don't have a clue how to start!
